dct_title_s: Basis geographiæ recentioris astronomica in qua situs locorum insigniorum geographici ea exactitudine, qua celeberrimi astronomi eosdem per observationes è plurimis luminarium et circumjovialium eclipsibus nobis hactenus suppeditarunt pro certiori geographiæ stabilimento positi designantur
dct_description_sm: Date of publication from Tooley. Double hemispherical world map showing the ecliptic, with charts of astronomical observations.
